sentences.en: He has no kinsfolk in America.
My kinsfolk have failed , and my familiar friends have forgotten me.
sentences.cn: 14我的亲戚与我断绝.我的密友都忘记我.

sentences.en: Poor Emily. Her kinsfolk should come to her.
sentences.cn: 可怜的埃米莉，她的亲人应该到她这来。

sentences.en: Their progeny is secure in their sight ; they see before them their kinsfolk and their offspring.
sentences.cn: 他们在世时, 子孙昌盛,亲眼看见子子孙孙.

sentences.en: Then came the news that Ellen's own marriage had ended in disaster, and that she was herself returning home to seek rest and oblivion among her kinsfolk.
sentences.cn: 这时，人们不禁纳闷，她那富有的侄女怎么不伸出手来帮帮她。 后来又传来了埃伦本人婚姻不幸终结的消息，她自己也要回家，到亲属中求得安息与忘却。

sentences.en: They can be friend and kinsfolk, play companion.
sentences.cn: 他们可以是朋友、亲人 、 玩伴.

sentences.en: This paper discusses the basic stand and visual angle of the feminist anthropology and its impact on the research of the anthropological kinsfolk system.
sentences.cn: 本文论述了妇女人类学的基本立场和视角，以及它对人类学的亲属制度研究领域所造成的冲击。

words.tran_cn: [法] 亲属关系，家属关系；亲密关系
